title: Is it Mandatory to perform Umrah if you come to Makkah? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Hamlet from Saudi Arabia he's saying that his aunt and she lives in Mecca and wherever she travels back home and she comes back she sees that it's an obligation for her to make her Amara whoever is in Mecca if he goes out and he comes back she believes that this is an obligation the answer is this is not correct she does not have to make home bruh if she wants to at hand Allah Allah will reward her but it is not an obligation and it is wrong to think that it is mandatory for her to perform
